text: Smash Mouth is a rock band from San Jose, California, USA and Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. Formed in 1994, the group is formed by Steve Harwell (lead vocals/Guitar), Greg Camp (guitar), Paul De Lisle (bass), and Kevin Coleman (original drummer). Their most famous song is "Walkin' on the Sun". ==Studio albums== *Fush Yu Mang (1997) *Astro Lounge (1999) *Smash Mouth (2001) *Get the Picture?
